thread.title: Oscars 2017: Inside the Governors Ball and more of the Academy Awards after parties
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Inside the Governors Ball and more of the Academy Awards after parties

title: Oscars 2017: Inside the Governors Ball and more of the Academy Awards after parties

organizations.name: elton john aids foundation's academy awards viewing party
25th annual elton john aids foundation's academy awards viewing party

text: Viola Davis Winner for Best Actress Emma Stone, who gave brother Spencer a shout out during her acceptance speech, partied the night away with her sibling at the 89th Annual Academy Awards Governors Ball. Photo: ANGELA WEISS/AFP/Getty Images Viola Davis, winner of the award for Actress in a Supporting Role, and actor husband Julius Tennon had some company – her statuette! – at the 89th Annual Academy Awards Governors Ball at Hollywood & Highland Center. Photo: Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images Best supporting actress winner Viola Davis got a smooch from her husband Julius as she had her trophy engraved at the 89th Annual Academy Awards Governors Ball. Photo: ANGELA WEISS/AFP/Getty Images Last year's best actor winner Leonardo DiCaprio mingled with the crowd at the 89th Annual Academy Awards Governors Ball. Photo: Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images 'Hidden Figures' stars Octavia Spencer and Janelle Monae looked like they were having a ball at the Governors Ball. Photo: ANGELA WEISS/AFP/Getty Images Andrew Garfield appeared humbled to be meeting Jackie Chan at the 89th Annual Academy Awards Governors Ball. Photo: ANGELA WEISS/AFP/Getty Images Busy Philipps and Ruth Negga had a chat at the Governors Ball at Hollywood & Highland Center. Photo: ANGELA WEISS/AFP/Getty Images Looking unfazed by his best picture 'La La Land' flub, film legend, Warren Beatty, partied at the 89th Annual Academy Awards Governors Ball in Hollywood & Highland Center. Photo: Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images Strike a pose! Left to right, supermodels Alessandra Ambrosio, Adriana Lima, and Josephine Skriver took a selfie at the 25th Annual Elton John AIDS Foundation's Academy Awards Viewing Party. Photo: Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for EJAF Husband and wife team Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban joined Mark Malkin at the 89th Annual Academy Awards Governors Ball. Photo: Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images Ruby Rose and Laverne Cox made for an elegant pair at the 25th Annual Elton John AIDS Foundation's Academy Awards Viewing Party. Photo: Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for EJAF Host Elton John greeted singer Ricky Martin at the 25th Annual Elton John AIDS Foundation's Academy Awards Viewing Party. Photo: Michael Kovac/Getty Images for EJAF Left to right: Model Andreja Pejic, Caitlyn Jenner and Sharon Stone were all glam at the 25th Annual Elton John AIDS Foundation's Academy Awards Viewing Party. Photo: Michael Kovac/Getty Images for EJAF Model Petra Nemcova had her cellphone in hand to capture the best moments at the 25th Annual Elton John AIDS Foundation's Academy Awards Viewing Party. Photo by Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for EJAF Work! Tracee Ellis Ross attended the Mercedes-Benz + ICON MANN 2017 Academy Awards viewing party at Four Seasons Hotel in L.A. Photo: Randy Shropshire/Getty Images for Mercedes-Benz USA Adrienne Bailon attended the Mercedes-Benz + ICON MANN 2017 Academy Awards viewing party at Four Seasons Hotel in L.A. Photo: Randy Shropshire/Getty Images for Mercedes-Benz USA Heidi Klum and her beau Vito Schnabel snuck a kiss during the Bulgari at the 25th annual Elton John AIDS Foundation's Academy Awards viewing party in L.A. Photo: Venturelli/Getty Images for BVLGARI Elton John took the stage at the 25th annual Elton John AIDS Foundation's Oscar viewing party in L.A. Photo: Venturelli/Getty Images for BVLGARI Model behavior! Josephine Skriver, Jasmine Sanders and Charlotte Moss sat pretty during the 25th annual Elton John AIDS Foundation's Academy Awards Viewing Party in L.A. Photo: Venturelli/Getty Images for BVLGARI Mindy Kaling and BJ Novak reunited for some photo booth fun during the Vanity Fair Oscars after party. Photo: Instagram/@mindykaling Jesse Tyler Ferguson was at the center of a "Jonas sandwich" next to Nick and Joe Jonas at the Vanity Fair Oscars after party.
